bug.author: potterhsu
bug.summary: tf.variable_scope argument with some keywords makes TensorBoard work incorrectly
bug.description: Problem: Step 1: with tf.variable_scope('length'): Step2: Run Tensorboard Step3: Switch to Graphs tab, but no graph will show.

comments.comment: Please include all the information requested in the issues template. For a bug report, a minimal complete reproducible example is very helpful.
